      • open

        public AnvilGUI open(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Creates the anvil GUI and opens it for the player
        Parameters:
        player - The Player the anvil GUI should open for
        Returns:
        The AnvilGUI instance from this builder
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when the onComplete function, plugin, or player is null
        IllegalStateException - If both text and item are supplied
